jobs.title: Game Artist - Puzzle Games
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

This position is Paris-based, with relocation support available.

Team

You will be an integral part of a newly established internal studio, a dynamic and focused team dedicated to elevating some of the most promising game concepts emerging from our innovative prototyping teams. This studio is specifically chartered to take high-potential prototypes and evolve them into successful, market-ready titles.

In this exciting role, your initial focus will be on either This is Blast!, or Card Factory, two games that have already demonstrated significant promise and captured our attention with their compelling core mechanics and engaging gameplay.

You'll have the opportunity to contribute directly to the growth and refinement of This is Blast!, or Card Factory, leveraging its existing traction to build a truly exceptional player experience. This is a unique chance to join a project with established momentum while still having a significant impact on the future direction within a dedicated and agile studio environment.

Role

We’re looking for an Artist who is a game maker at heart and who accepts the challenges of working in a fast-paced live game environment. You combine artistic excellence with product thinking and proactive ownership. We’re not looking for someone to wait to be given out tasks - you should take initiative and own it. You code whenever you can too.

Your outputs:

  • Final assets that plug directly into Unity—implemented, not just designed

  • Hypotheses and ideas that start from a player’s perspective and monetization lens, not just visual taste

  • Proposals grounded in game direction, not generic moodboards

  • Constant small improvements in live games: self-created Asana tasks, tagged team

  • UI/UX designs challenged, improved, and implemented by you.

Profile

  • 5+ years in mobile F2P, preferably casual or puzzles as a Game Artist, Technical Artist, or other art roles in 3D or 2D

  • You don’t need a developer to integrate your assets; You should have Unity experience, asset implementation & UI assembly

  • You don’t need an introduction to collaborative software (high proficiency in Figma)

  • You are easy to understand and you are a clear communicator in English (B2+)

  • You get what sells and you are product-minded, proposing ideas grounded in game needs

  • You’re interested in exploring the use of AI tools in your workflow (across 2D, 3D, and video workflows)

  • You are proactive by default

  • Nice to have:

    • Basic knowledge of shaders, and materials in Unity

    • Knowledge of 3D modeling , texturing workflows

Benefits

  • Competitive salary

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Child daycare facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

jobs.title: Product Strategist - Wizz
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our consumer apps teams are at the forefront of crafting innovative and engaging apps for daily enjoyment.

Our ambition extends beyond gaming to entertain a global audience. Millions of people around the world, especially in the US, download and use the apps we create.

You'll be working on Wizz, a social app specifically designed for teens, boasting over 3 million monthly active users in the US and UK. Wizz is a friend-finding and chat app where young people can safely express themselves and connect with like-minded peers in an authentic, pressure-free environment. Unlike other social media platforms that focus on followers, posts, or passive consumption, Wizz offers young people a space to have meaningful 1:1 conversations with peers.

As a member of a high-performing team of 20, you'll collaborate to further scale and enhance Wizz, fostering a spirit of goodwill and creativity. As Wizz continues its dynamic growth and development, we are seeking an ambitious Product Strategist to join.

Role

  • Analyze Wizz competitive environment and identify new business opportunities

  • Report directly to the CEO

  • Combine analytics and user research to identify user drives, fuel ideation, and lead product improvements.

  • Manage some product operations (e.g., CRM, Monetization) and solve problems as they arise.

  • Contribute to high-level strategic decisions. Help define short and long-term roadmaps.

  • Identify key metrics and take ownership for improving them.

Profile

  • You’re passionate about B2C mobile apps.

  • Tier 1 academic background in the business or engineering field

  • A first experience (internship) in a fast-paced environment (top-tier consulting firm, banking, start-up, scale-up)

  • You’re hyper-analytical: you obsess over product metrics, test your hypotheses rigorously, and make data-driven decisions.

  • You haven't necessarily yet experience in product management but you have an intuitive feel for UI and UX.

  • You’re highly driven and autonomous.

  • You’re fluent in French & English

Benefits

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Wizz)

  • Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family 100% borne by Wizz

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Unlimited vacation policy

  • Remote days on Mondays, Tuesdays and Fridays

Voodoo just won the award for Best Office Space in France

jobs.title: HR Operations Specialist
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our Corporate teams support the company’s performance and growth whilst putting people at the core of everything they do. As a French tech leader and global successful company, our Corporate teams are constantly looking for ways to innovate and increase organization efficiency to keep Voodoo ahead of the market. Voodoo’s Corporate function is composed of five teams: HR, Talent Acquisition, Legal, M&A, and Finance, working together to drive Voodoo’s success.

As a Junior HR Operations Specialist, you will play a vital role in supporting the HR team with day-to-day operations and ensuring an exceptional employee experience.

Responsibilities

  • Own the excellent delivery of operational HR lifecycle in all countries where Voodoo is present from onboarding to offboarding, including preparation of appropriate documentation, immigration compliance or implementation of processes.

  • Maintain compliance with policies and legal requirements by managing relationships with relevant administrative stakeholders.

  • Own the maintenance and updates of employee data in the HR Information System (BambooHR), ensuring accuracy and timely adjustments for any changes in employee status.

  • Support payroll data processing, including tracking bonuses, salary increases, and sick leave.

  • Oversee the administration of employee benefits to ensure compliance and accuracy.

  • Participate in the strengthening of our HR Operations, understanding what matters to our People and ensure our function is high-performing notably providing first-line support for HR inquiries through the ticketing system, ensuring timely and accurate resolution of employee issues and escalating when necessary.

Profile

  • 1-2 years progressive experience in an HR role (apprenticeship or junior-level experience in HR operations or administration is a plus)

  • Full proficiency in French and English

  • Understands basic HR processes and be eager to learn more about compliance, documentation, and payroll coordination

  • Demonstrates strong attention to detail, organizational and problem-solving skills

  • Problem-solving enthusiasm: you go beyond identifying issues or challenges and focus on how to address them

  • Great communication skills across languages and cultures with an ability to build trust-based relationships at all levels of the organization

  • Proactive, adaptable, and eager to learn and grow within a dynamic HR environment

  • Team player and a good sense of humor are definitely a plus

  • Familiarity with payroll, benefits, immigration, relocation processes is an advantage

Benefits

  • Competitive salary

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Remote days

  • Child daycare facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

jobs.title: Global senior Social Media Manager - BeReal
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About BeReal

At BeReal, we are dedicated to authenticity in social media. By encouraging users to share unfiltered moments, we foster genuine connections and celebrate real life. We are now an international team of 70+ and have 40M+ monthly active users. Backed by Voodoo, our team is fully focused on scaling BeReal into an iconic social network used by hundreds of millions.

Role

We’re looking for a creative, independent, and strategic Senior Social Media Manager to reactivate and reinvent BeReal’s presence on all global social platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and yes — even BeReal itself.

You’ll own BeReal’s voice across platforms, rekindle engagement with our millions of followers, and create content that feels human, on trend, and on brand. From lo-fi check-ins to thumb-stopping creative to strategic collabs, you’ll help shape what BeReal means to this next generation — especially as we expand into monetization.

  • Lead BeReal’s owned social media presence across TikTok, Instagram, and BeReal, with the potential to expand to emerging platforms

  • Reignite community engagement with creative, raw, and resonant content that reflects BeReal’s values: authenticity, mental health, and presence

  • Design and own the content calendar, from planned storytelling to real-time reactive posts

  • Shape the voice and tone of BeReal across all platforms, reinforcing our distinct POV in the social landscape

  • Collaborate with our community to elevate user stories and content (UGC), and amplify our most passionate voices

  • Partner with the Brand Strategy team to roll out campaigns that support growth, brand trust, and cultural relevance — particularly as we introduce ads

  • Track and analyze performance to inform strategy and optimize for engagement, reach, and resonance

  • Ensure alignment with overall brand strategy and comms priorities

Profile

  • 5+ years experience managing social media for a youth-focused, culture-first brand or platform on a global scale (ideally EMEA + USA)

  • Deep understanding of Gen Z behavior, trends, memes, and what it takes to earn attention (and trust)

  • Strong creative instincts and impeccable taste — you know what feels right, and what doesn’t

  • Proven ability to grow and engage large audiences across platforms

  • Confidence to work autonomously and take creative risks, with a test-learn-optimize mindset

  • Excellent writing and visual storytelling skills (bonus if you can shoot/edit content too)

  • Passionate about authenticity, mental health, and building a better version of social media

  • Paris based

jobs.title: Senior Data Analyst - Growth
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile industry. The Engineering & Data team plays a key role in Voodoo’s long-term strategy. It enables Voodoo to both accelerate product diversification and provide a state of the art growth-engine to distribute and scale our games. They create innovative solutions that drive growth with a pragmatic approach, ranging from simple searching to complex machine learning systems.

We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst who is deeply passionate about data-driven decisions, transforming raw data into clear actionable business insights, and who is constantly driving themselves and the team towards completing the next challenge.

By joining this team, you will have a strong impact on the business and a unique opportunity to reach hundreds of millions of users with your insights and recommendations.

Role

  • As the Senior analyst in charge of the User Acquisition scope, liaise with business stakeholders and help our Growth Team better understand the data in order to optimise our Marketing and Monetization processes

  • Analyze large, complex data sets representing the behavior of millions of online and mobile game players, come up with innovative solutions to address strategic and operational business questions

  • Build and manage robust data pipelines to align with ever-evolving business needs, ensuring optimal architecture support

  • Develop dashboards and reports to foster company-wide comprehension of key business metrics and growth performance

  • Manage multiple projects at a time in a fast-paced, results-oriented environment

Profile

  • 5 years+ of experience in analytical roles

  • Extensive SQL experience

  • Practical experience with Tableau or another visualisation tool

  • Some experience with DBT and Python is considered a plus

  • Solid experience liaising with and influencing senior stakeholders and helping them achieve their business goals

  • Advanced knowledge of statistical tools and models will be considered a significant advantage

Benefits

  • Competitive salary

  • Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Remote days

  • Child daycare facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

jobs.title: General Manager - Casual Games
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

The full-remote option is accepted only if you reside in a country where the company has a legal entity.

Team

Our Gaming team is made up of hybrid-casual, casual and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.

Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games, while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the largest and most successful hybrid publisher in the world.

Voodoo is creating a small experimentation team with a big mission: find the next best way to entertain the world by taking our best hits to a new level.

You will be one of the first members in a team of six and you will participate in every aspect of development, from ideation to testing the casual games in the market.

Role

  • Build your team and ensure that your team reaches their goals

  • Lead, inspire and motivate the teams working on the games, and maintain enthusiasm for the project

  • Improve continuously the internal process of game creation

  • Push updates with gameplay, meta-features and monetisation AB tests at a high pace

  • Follow and improve Voodoo’s management guidelines and onboarding processes

  • Manage your team’s HR in order to keep only A players and help them to grow

  • Share your knowledge company-wide and help others grow their skills

  • Monitor and improve game metrics 

  • Be involved in all aspects of game development: UI, UX, game design, technical

Profile

  • Strong analytical skills and are detail and data-oriented

  • Passion for mobile games

  • Excellent communication, organization, execution skills

  • Good game UX knowledge,

  • Mobile F2P market experiences, track record with a successful mobile game

  • Speak and write English

  • Understanding of game design

Benefits

  • Best in Class compensation

  • Other benefits according to the country you reside.

jobs.title: Level Designer - Puzzle Games
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

This position is Paris-based, with relocation support available.

Team

You will be an integral part of a newly established internal studio, a dynamic and focused team dedicated to elevating some of the most promising game concepts emerging from our innovative prototyping teams. This studio is specifically chartered to take high-potential prototypes and evolve them into successful, market-ready titles.

This is a unique chance to join a project with established momentum while still having a significant impact on its future direction within a dedicated and agile studio environment

Role

We’re seeking a talented and seasoned Lead Level Designer who is deeply passionate about puzzle games and laser-focused on creating the next big hit. With extensive experience in the industry, you'll play a pivotal role in delivering fun to millions of players. As the driving force behind the game's success, you'll ensure the game reaches the highest standards of quality and innovation.

  • Collaborating with our creative team to design and plan innovative game levels that align with our unique gameplay style and appeal to our global audience

  • Using our proprietary game development tools to bring your designs to life, creating immersive environments, interactive elements, and challenging obstacles

  • Implementing and adapting our core game mechanics into your level designs to create a seamless, engaging gameplay experience

  • Working closely with our team of artists, animators, and programmers to ensure your level designs are fully realized

  • Testing and balancing your levels, taking into account player feedback and data to ensure they are fun, fair, and in line with our high-quality standards

  • Documenting your level designs using diagrams, flowcharts, and spreadsheets to communicate your concepts effectively within the team

  • Ensuring your designs adhere to technical constraints and opportunities presented by our game engine.

Profile

  • At least 3 years of experience in a Level Design for a puzzle casual game

  • Understanding of models and tools to analyze gameplay and user behavior

  • Proven experience in level design, with a portfolio demonstrating your ability to create engaging, fun levels for games

  • Proficiency in level design software and scripting languages

  • Excellent problem-solving skills, with a creative approach to design challenges

  • Strong communication skills, able to work effectively within a team and explain your ideas clearly.

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer - Wizz
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

About Wizz

Our consumer apps teams are at the forefront of crafting innovative and engaging apps for daily enjoyment. Our ambition extends beyond gaming to entertain a global audience. Millions of people around the world, especially in the US, download and use the apps we create.

You'll be working on Wizz, a social app specifically designed for teens, boasting over 3 million monthly active users in the US and UK. Wizz is a friend-finding and chat app where young people can safely express themselves and connect with like-minded peers in an authentic, pressure-free environment.

Unlike other social media platforms that focus on followers, posts, or passive consumption, Wizz offers young people a space to have safe and meaningful 1:1 conversations with peers.

Team

At Wizz, our small, agile, and versatile team is involved in all aspects of the company, united by a shared and ambitious vision. We operate at the intersection of data science, design, engineering, and operations, working in synergy without silos. Each team member plays a key role and has a direct impact on Wizz's success, with strong autonomy to identify opportunities, propose innovative solutions, oversee their implementation, and evaluate the results. Together, we strive to create engaging and fun experiences while continuously improving user experience, with the goal of making Wizz an essential app for millions of people worldwide.

Role

  • Collaborating closely with research, data, product, and engineering to define problems, identify opportunities, and improve existing products or introduce new features.

  • Identifying key issues and proposing pragmatic solutions with an estimation of the business impact.

  • Leading co-creative workshops (ideation, design reviews, design critiques, etc.) to generate ideas and refine solutions.

  • Imagining, building, measuring, and iterating on solutions to have an impact with the product teams.

  • Participating in the prioritization of product initiatives to align efforts with business objectives.

  • Identifying key metrics to improve with your solutions and taking responsibility for their success.

  • Fostering strong engagement, high performance, and involvement from product teams to collectively design high-quality solutions that meet best-in-class standards.

Profile

  • High-level skills in at least two of the following areas: UX design, interaction design, information architecture, and UI design.

  • You understand the desires and expectations of Gen Z users, and you love digging deep to understand their needs in detail.

  • You are autonomous, results-driven, and able to propose solutions with a strong business impact.

  • You enjoy designing captivating features while maintaining a pragmatic focus on business impact.

  • You view feedback as a way to grow, and you enjoy both giving and receiving it.

  • You’re fluent in French & English

Benefits

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Wizz)

  • Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family 100% borne by Wizz

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Unlimited vacation policy

  • Remote days on Mondays, Tuesdays and Fridays

jobs.title: Lead Data Scientist
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile gaming industry.

Within the Data team, you’ll join the BI/Prediction Team which is an autonomous squad of around 10 people. The team is composed of top-tier product managers, software & data engineers, data scientists and data analysts.

Role

The objective of this team is to accelerate the growth of the company by serving as the on-demand prediction provider for all Voodoo BUs. This involves addressing critical needs such as predicting campaign LTV for User Acquisition optimization, determining optimal monetization offers for millions of players or constructing confidence intervals for time series data prediction.

We want to onboard a passionate senior data scientist with significant experience in a similar environment to allow us to go one step further. This is an opportunity to have a strategic and critical impact on Voodoo’s success.

This position is hybrid and requires 3 days per week in the office based in Paris.

  • Take ownership of our products modeling pipelines

  • Contribute to high modeling performance through insightful ideas and initiatives.

  • Build and deploy quickly scalable ML systems.

  • Engage with colleagues across the company to leverage new ideas and perspectives and demonstrate excellent communication to efficiently cooperate with product managers, teammates and stakeholders.

  • Deep dive into data to discover relevant insights.

  • Build a rich understanding of the mobile gaming industry, the company strategy, our products and their fit within the company’s daily operations.

  • Mentor and guide a team of data scientists, fostering technical excellence and autonomy.

  • Establish and enforce best practices in ML engineering, experimentation, and reproducibility across projects.

  • Champion a culture of impact-driven research, ensuring models not only perform well technically but also create tangible business value.

  • Proactively identify risks in modeling approaches, data quality, scalability, business alignment and design mitigation strategies.

Profile

  • Extensive experience building machine learning systems

  • Extensive experience with Python, SQL and MLOps best practices

  • Cloud experience needed (ideally AWS but could be another cloud provider)

  • Airflow and DBT experience is a nice to have

  • Excellent Communication in English and French mandatory

  • You enjoy working in a team, learning new things, sharing knowledge

  • Experience in a tech startup/scaleup is a plus

  • Strong achievements on Kaggle will be valued

Benefits

  • Competitive salary

  • Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Remote days

  • Child daycare facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

jobs.title: Senior Fullstack Engineer - AdOps
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile gaming industry.

Role

We are looking for a Software Engineer to join Voodoo’s Ad Network Engineering team. You will be part of the AdOps team in a group of senior software engineers, and report directly to the Engineering Manager.

In this role, you will help build and enhance the web tools that drive our advertising ecosystem. These include a campaign manager for gaming and branding campaigns, reporting and publisher features, and upcoming initiatives such as creating a more intuitive UI, developing an open API for external partners, and ultimately evolving toward a self-serve platform.

You will collaborate closely with experienced engineers to design, develop, and deliver scalable features with a strong emphasis on impact, reliability, and usability.

Our current stack includes Java, DGS, and DocumentDB on the backend, and TypeScript, Vue.js, and PrimeVue on the frontend. However, we prioritize solid engineering fundamentals and problem-solving skills over specific language expertise.

Profile

You are excited to positively impact the company revenues in a fast paced environment, prioritizing meaningful business outcomes over processes.

You demonstrate strong product ownership, able to take end-to-end responsibility for a feature: from engaging with users to ensuring the success of the features, including challenging requirements, designing both product and technical solutions, implementing with quality, communicating and shipping.

You bring a +5 years experience in building web UIs and APIs for both internal stakeholders and external partners, without any technology boundaries from the UI to the database, and you are well-versed in software engineering practices (testing, code reviews, NoSQL, devops, cloud, troubleshooting).

You thrive in international, diverse teams, and you value feedback from your peers whatever is their level to continue to grow in spite of your seniority.

You are eager to learn and grow in AdTech, with a genuine interest in how advertising campaigns are configured and executed across the ad network stack.

jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our Gaming team is made up of hybrid-casual, casual, and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.

Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the world's largest and most successful hybrid publisher.

You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on Paper.io 2.

With Paper.io2, we’re building an iconic game that players will never forget!

We're a small team of excellent people who take care of everything from ideas to testing, and we intend to grow while maintaining our high standards.

Role

  • Conduct comprehensive manual testing of our mobile games to identify and document crucial defects, taking ownership of the entire QA process to assure quality and user experience.

  • Creating processes and tools to improve the overall quality of the game.

  • Follow the technical KPIs of our live games and propose strategies to continuously improve them.

  • Coordinate closely with design and development teams, understanding game mechanics and providing essential feedback to improve and refine the product.

  • Design test plans for new features and releases.

  • Prioritize and execute testing tasks efficiently at different development stages, aligning with project timelines and objectives while independently addressing and resolving issues found.

  • Foster an open feedback culture, actively participating in constructive dialogue with team members to facilitate collaboration and innovation.

  • Work with our central tech teams in quality-related initiatives.

Profile

  • 3+ years as a QA Engineer in Mobile Games, demonstrating ownership and successful project completion.

  • Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to take up tasks from start to finish with little assistance and identify and address issues independently and effectively.

  • Reliable self-starter and team player, capable of taking responsibility and contributing positively to team dynamics.

  • Passion for mobile games with insight into the player's perspective and expectations.

  • Proven experience using various testing tools and methodologies for mobile games.

  • Clear communication skills with the ability to articulate complex ideas to various stakeholders effectively.

  • Good understanding of Free-to-Play (F2P) games and game design principles and release management experience are a plus

  • Fluent English (speaking and writing)

Benefits

  • Best-in-class compensation

  • Other benefits according to the country you reside

jobs.title: Junior Backend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile industry.

Within the Data team, you’ll join the Ad-Network Team which is an autonomous squad of around 30 people. The team is composed of top-tier software engineers, infrastructure engineers, data engineers, mobile engineers, and data scientists (among which 3 Kaggle Masters). The goal of this team is to provide a way for Voodoo to monetize our inventory directly with advertising partners, and relies on advanced technological solutions to optimize advertising in a real-time bidding environment. It is a strategic topic with significant impact on the business.

This roles requires to be onsite 3 days/week and is Paris based.


Role

  • Assist in building and maintaining backend services that enable audience targeting for real-time bidding decisions in an OpenRTB environment.

  • Collaborate with senior engineers to design and implement targeting algorithms, ensuring accurate and efficient delivery of personalized ads based on user data, behaviors, and preferences.

  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code in Python, Java, or Go.

  • Participate in code reviews, ensuring adherence to best practices and contributing to a collaborative learning environment.

  • Assist in optimizing backend systems for scalability and performance under real-time traffic conditions.

  • Learn and contribute to the design of RESTful APIs that serve targeting-related data and decisions.

  • Troubleshoot and debug backend issues, assisting senior engineers with system optimizations and performance improvements.

  • Gain experience working with real-time systems, focusing on low-latency processing of targeting information for bidding

Profile (Must have)

  • 0-2 years of experience in backend engineering or software development (internships, projects, or full-time roles).

  • Familiarity with at least one backend programming language (e.g., Python, Java, Go, Node.js).

  • Basic understanding of databases (SQL and NoSQL) and experience with querying and managing data.

  • Familiarity with API development and integration of backend systems.

  • Strong desire to learn and grow within the AdTech field, with an interest in real-time bidding and targeting strategies.

  • Ability to work in a collaborative team environment, including participating in code reviews and learning from senior engineers.

  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and the basics of deploying backend services.

  • Basic knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and familiarity with development workflows.

  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to take ownership of small tasks and projects.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family is 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Child day care facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Unlimited vacation policy

  • Remote days

jobs.title: Technical Director - New Games
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

This position is Paris-based, with relocation support available.

Team

We are seeking a talented Technical Lead to lead our team in creating our next casual hit. This unique opportunity involves defining and building the foundation of a new puzzle game studio from the ground up, covering technical, operational, and strategic aspects:

  • Partner with the General Manager to structure, recruit, and onboard the technical team

  • Define and establish the technical foundations for a new puzzle game, addressing all aspects from prototype to worldwide launch, including the creation of the switcher engine, level editor, and future live operations

  • Develop and implement ways of working for the engineering craft, including technical practices, team rituals, and collaboration processes

  • Define an execute the long-term technical strategy for the studio, ensuring scalability for both the team and the game, in alignment with the overall product and studio strategy

  • Work with product leadership on roadmap, rollouts, and adoption strategies

  • Engage in hands-on coding when needed, building new features and iterating rapidly based on player feedback and market testing

  • Monitor the health of the product, guiding the technical team to continuously enhance product quality and address issues promptly

  • Help the General Manager and other Leads manage the studio, contributing to its strategy, operations, and people management, always fostering a culture of innovation and creativity


With this role, you will have a strong impact on the company by contributing daily to important decisions with a multidisciplinary team of passionate and talented people working on one of the most successful Voodoo games. Flesh out the details of a game's design, oversee its testing and revise the game in response to player feedback. Thanks to your creativity and your teamwork, let’s entertain millions of people with our hit games.

Profile

  • 3 years of experience as a Technical Director or Technical Lead on casual games

  • At least 5+ years of professional experience with Unity

  • Successful track record in top-tier mobile casual games, with experience in both new and live game development

  • Experience in creating, growing, and leading engineering teams

  • A creative and innovative mindset with strong problem-solving skills

  • Excellent communication skills

  • Comfortable switching from management work to hands-on coding as needed

  • Experience with backend development or client-server interactions

  • Extremely passionate about casual games and driven to create a new hit

  • Entrepreneurial mindset, enthusiastic about building new things from the ground up

Benefits

  • Best-in-class compensation

  • Other benefits according to the country you reside

jobs.title: Experienced Data Analyst - Gaming
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile industry. The Engineering & Data team plays a key role in Voodoo’s long-term strategy by accelerating product diversification and providing a state of the art growth-engine to distribute and scale our games. 

The Analytics Team works closely with Voodoo’s game studios. Our role is to analyse gaming behaviour and provide valuable insights to studio game analysts, helping them monitor and improve the performance of their games. Our expertise in analysing gaming behaviour enables us to develop and deliver innovative solutions that drive growth and ensure the success of Voodoo’s gaming portfolio.

Role

  • Work on end-to-end data projects with internal departments to produce better games and drive monetization and retention improvements.

  • Gather needs from stakeholders, build data collection and transformation pipelines, train and deploy simple predictive models into production.

  • Share progress with game analysts by building dashboards and providing them with actionable recommendations.

  • Analyze large, complex data sets with billions of events representing the behavior of online and mobile game players to address strategic and operational business questions.

  • Design solutions from scratch, iterate quickly, create POCs, and deploy to production rapidly. 

  • You enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and are able to balance the tradeoff between time-consuming development and rapid results.

Profile

  • You possess substantial experience in analytical roles, ideally within a web or mobile company or the online gaming industry.

  • You are highly skilled in SQL and have a proven track record of building production-ready pipelines that handle large and complex data sets.

  • You have solid experience in ETL development

  • You have practical experience with Tableau, and can create dashboards that are shared company-wide, facilitating data-driven decision-making across departments.

  • You enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and are able to balance the tradeoff between time-consuming development and rapid results.

  • A BA/B.Sc degree in Statistics, Math, Engineering, Economy, or other quantitative fields is mandatory for this role.

  • Advanced knowledge of statistical tools and models will be considered a significant advantage.

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

  • Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family is 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Child day care facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Unlimited vacation policy

  • Remote days

 - Excellent communication skills and a strong teamwork mindset

 - Good sense of gameplay experience and special attention to detail

jobs.title: Experienced Data Analyst - Ad Network
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Voodoo Ad-Network is an autonomous product of around 30 people that carries the ambitious mission of providing ad network services. One goal is to leverage Voodoo’s first-party data to improve Voodoo’s monetisation. Moreover, the product is growing through new ventures like opening up to external inventory, reaching the external-advertisers market and social-network monetisation through BeReal’s recent acquisition. Thanks to promising results, our ambition is now to scale up the team to support growth.
The product is composed of top-tier software engineers, infrastructure engineers, data engineers, mobile engineers, and data scientists.
The Models team is a core element of the targeting performance. It leverages machine learning and a strong business understanding to directly impact the product’s financial performance. It’s composed of mostly senior Data Analysts, Analytics Engineers, Data Engineers and Data Scientists/ML Engineers who iterate together on finding and building the next performing iteration.

Role

  • Work on end-to-end data projects with the Ad Network squads to improve performance and drive targeting and revenue improvements.

  • Gather needs from stakeholders, share progress with product managers and data scientists and provide them with actionable recommendations.

  • Build data collection and transformation pipelines, and actionable dashboards.

  • Analyze large, complex data sets with billions of events representing the behaviour of mobile game players and of our ad network to address strategic and operational business questions.

  • Design solutions from scratch, iterate quickly, create POCs, and deploy to production rapidly.

  • Occasionally leverage Python skills and Statistics skills to improve the targeting product with your business insights.

Profile

  • You possess substantial experience in analytical roles, ideally within a web or mobile company or the tech or ad tech industry.

  • You are highly skilled in SQL and have a proven track record of building production-ready pipelines that handle large and complex data sets.

  • You have solid experience in ETL development. Experience in DBT will be valued.

  • You have practical experience with Tableau or another standard dashboard platform, and can create dashboards that are shared company-wide, facilitating data-driven decision-making across departments.

  • A BA/B.Sc degree in Statistics, Math, Engineering, Economy, or other quantitative fields is mandatory for this role.

  • Advanced knowledge of statistical tools and models will be considered a significant advantage.

  • Development skills, particularly in Python, will be considered a significant advantage

  • You enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and are able to balance the tradeoff between time-consuming development and rapid results.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary based on experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% covered by Voodoo)

  • Premium healthcare coverage with SideCare, 100% covered for you and your family

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Remote Fridays

jobs.title: Junior Data Scientist
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team 

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile gaming industry.

Within the Data team, you’ll join the BI/Prediction Team which is an autonomous squad of around 10 people. The team is composed of top-tier product managers, software & data engineers,  data scientists and data analysts.

Role

The objective of this team is to accelerate the growth of the company by serving as the on-demand prediction provider for all Voodoo BUs. This involves addressing critical needs such as predicting campaign LTV for User Acquisition optimization, determining optimal monetization offers for millions of players or constructing confidence intervals for time series data prediction.

We want to onboard a passionate data scientist with significant experience in a similar environment to allow us to go one step further. This is an opportunity to have a strategic and critical impact on Voodoo’s success.

This position is hybrid and requires 3 days per week in the office based in Paris.

  • Take ownership of our products modeling pipelines

  • Contribute to high modeling performance through insightful ideas and initiatives.

  • Build and deploy quickly scalable ML systems. 

  • Promote good coding practices, rigor and good-quality work.

  • Engage with colleagues across the company to leverage new ideas and perspectives and demonstrate excellent communication to efficiently cooperate with product managers, teammates and stakeholders.

  • Deep dive into data to discover relevant insights. 

  • Build a rich understanding of the mobile gaming industry, the company strategy, our products and their fit within the company’s daily operations.

Be a team player by supporting your teammates and sharing with them your knowledge or new discoveries.

Profile

  • Hands-on experience building machine learning systems

  • Familiar with with Python, SQL and MLOps best practices 

  • Cloud experience needed (ideally AWS but could be another cloud provider)

  • Airflow and DBT experience is a nice to have 

  • Excellent Communication in English and French mandatory to liaise with both a tech and business audience.

  • You enjoy working in a team, learning new things, sharing knowledge

  • Experience in a tech startup/scaleup is a plus

  • Strong achievements on Kaggle will be valued

Benefits

  • Competitive salary 

  • Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Remote days

  • Child daycare facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager - Wizz
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our consumer apps teams are at the forefront of crafting innovative and engaging apps for daily enjoyment.

Our ambition extends beyond gaming to entertain a global audience. Millions of people around the world, especially in the US, download and use the apps we create.

You'll be working on Wizz, a social app specifically designed for teens, boasting over 3 million monthly active users in the US and UK. Wizz is a friend-finding and chat app where young people can safely express themselves and connect with like-minded peers in an authentic, pressure-free environment. Unlike other social media platforms that focus on followers, posts, or passive consumption, Wizz offers young people a space to have meaningful 1:1 conversations with peers.

As a member of a high-performing team of 20, you'll collaborate to further scale and enhance Wizz, fostering a spirit of goodwill and creativity. As Wizz continues its dynamic growth and development, we are seeking an ambitious Senior Product Manager to join.

Role

  • Analyze Wizz competitive environment and identify new business opportunities

  • Report directly to CEO

  • Combine analytics and user research to identify user drives, fuel ideation, and lead product improvements.

  • Manage some product operations (e.g., CRM, Monetization) and solve problems as they arise.

  • Contribute to high-level strategic decisions. Help define short and long-term roadmaps.

  • Identify key metrics and take ownership for improving them.

Profile

  • You’re passionate about B2C mobile apps.

  • A strong experience in a fast-paced environment (top-tier consulting firm, banking, start-up, scale-up)

  • You’re hyper-analytical: you obsess over product metrics, test your hypotheses rigorously, and make data-driven decisions.

  • You have a strong intuitive feel for UI and UX.

  • You’re highly driven and autonomous.

  • You’re fluent in French & English

Benefits

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Wizz)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

jobs.title: Head of iOS - BeReal
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

At BeReal, we are dedicated to authenticity in social media. By encouraging users to share unfiltered moments, we foster genuine connections and celebrate real life. We are now an international team of 60+ and have 40M+ monthly active users. Backed by Voodoo, our team is fully focused on scaling BeReal into an iconic social network used by hundreds of millions.

Role

We are looking for a Head of iOS with a product mindset to join one of our feature teams. You’ll be involved in building and refining new user-facing features that help people connect more meaningfully on BeReal. You will lead our iOS Chapter, composed of 15+ developers, drive technical excellence, and contribute hands-on to the product. This role combines technical leadership and hands-on development in a fast-paced, product-led environment.

  • Design, implement, and maintain scalable, high-performance iOS features using Swift, SwiftUI, Combine, and Swift Concurrency.

  • Work closely with design, product, and data teams to create thoughtful, high-quality experiences.

  • Define the technical vision: architecture, quality, tooling, best practices

  • Contribute directly to the codebase and participate in code reviews

  • Ensure consistency and excellence across squads

  • Lead and mentor the iOS chapter: recruiting, coaching, developing engineers

  • Represent the iOS stack in strategic discussions and cross-team initiatives

Our Stack

  • iOS: Swift, Combine, SwiftUI, SPM, Swift Concurrency, MVVM

  • Ops: Github.

  • Android: Kotlin, Compose, Coroutines, Room, gRPC.

  • Backend: Go, Node.js (NestJS, Nx, Typescript).

  • Database: Spanner, PostgreSQL, Redis.

  • Infrastructure: GCP, GKE, Firebase.

  • Data: Amplitude, Tableau.

Profile

  • 6+ years of experience in iOS development, including 1+ year in a leadership role

  • Deep expertise in Swift and SwiftUI; strong grasp of scalable architecture patterns

  • Hands-on leader who leads by example in code quality and collaboration

  • Experience in high-traffic, product-driven mobile environments

  • Passion for UX, performance, and user impact

  • Clear, empathetic communication; natural team facilitator

  • Bonus: experience in team structuring or engineering org scale-up

Benefits

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by BeReal)

  • Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family 100% borne by BeReal

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

jobs.title: Product Manager - Wizz
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our consumer apps teams are at the forefront of crafting innovative and engaging apps for daily enjoyment.

Our ambition extends beyond gaming to entertain a global audience. Millions of people around the world, especially in the US, download and use the apps we create.

You'll be working on Wizz, a social app specifically designed for teens, boasting over 3 million monthly active users in the US and UK. Wizz is a friend-finding and chat app where young people can safely express themselves and connect with like-minded peers in an authentic, pressure-free environment. Unlike other social media platforms that focus on followers, posts, or passive consumption, Wizz offers young people a space to have meaningful 1:1 conversations with peers.

As a member of a high-performing team of 20, you'll collaborate to further scale and enhance Wizz, fostering a spirit of goodwill and creativity. As Wizz continues its dynamic growth and development, we are seeking an ambitious Product Manager to join.

Role

  • Analyze Wizz's competitive environment and identify new business opportunities

  • Report directly to CEO

  • Combine analytics and user research to identify user drives, fuel ideation, and lead product improvements.

  • Manage some product operations (e.g., CRM, Monetization) and solve problems as they arise.

  • Contribute to high-level strategic decisions. Help define short and long-term roadmaps.

  • Identify key metrics and take ownership for improving them.

Profile

  • You’re passionate about B2C mobile apps.

  • A strong experience in a fast-paced environment (top-tier consulting firm, banking, start-up, scale-up)

  • You’re hyper-analytical: you obsess over product metrics, test your hypotheses rigorously, and make data-driven decisions.

  • You have a strong intuitive feel for UI and UX.

  • You’re highly driven and autonomous.

  • You’re fluent in French & English

Benefits

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Acting as the main technical and data liaison, overseeing all technology and data-driven strategies.

We’ve built BeReal with a tiny technology team of world-class engineers and we intend to keep this mindset as we scale it to hundreds of millions of users. To achieve this, we ship new features faster than any other scaled social network while upgrading our infrastructure. We work in small teams of generalists and give each engineer high autonomy to make product related decisions.

  • Tackle exciting technical challenges, given the nature of our product, which experiences spikes of millions of users connecting within a 2-minute window.

  • Contribute to the development of a robust architecture capable of supporting massive scale as we attract new users and expand to new countries.

  • Collaborate with the product and engineering teams to create new features for the app.

  • Analyze trade-offs and address technical challenges related to key components of our backend.

  • Participate in code and design reviews.

  • Backend: Go, Node.js (NestJS, Nx, Typescript)

jobs.title: Senior Data Analyst
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team 

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile gaming industry.

Within the Data team, you'll join a Machine Learning Development Team which is an autonomous squad of around 10 people. The team is composed of top-tier product managers, software & data engineers, data scientists and data analysts.

Role

The objective of this team is to accelerate the growth of the company by serving as the on-demand prediction provider for all Voodoo BUs. This involves addressing critical needs such as predicting campaign LTV for User Acquisition optimization, determining optimal monetization offers for millions of players or constructing confidence intervals for time series data prediction.

We want to onboard a passionate data analyst with significant experience in a similar environment to allow us to go one step further. This is an opportunity to have a strategic and critical impact on Voodoo’s success.

This position is hybrid and requires 3 days per week in the office based in Paris.

  • Design, build and monitor data models & dashboards to track business metrics

  • Ability to define, execute, and communicate results of complex statistical models with minimal guidance, working cross-functionally with teams like product, growth and finance.

  • Thoroughly document your results and offer onboarding and continuous training to help teams effectively utilize data and insights.

  • Establish data quality processes to ensure the reliability and accuracy of our machine learning models.

  • Promote data literacy within the organization and serve as the primary point of contact for all data-related inquiries and support.

  • Guide less experienced analysts, set best practices, and help upskill the team through knowledge-sharing and coaching

  • Ability to translate data insights into high-level business strategies, proactively identifying opportunities to drive revenue and optimize costs.

  • Work closely with the central data team to source additional data and enhance data management practices

Profile

  • At least 5 years' experience in Data Analysis

  • Proficient with SQL and/or Python, with a proven experience working with large and complex data sets.

  • Autonomous person with a strong analytical mindset, problem-solving skills and strong attention to detail.

  • Experience with statistical modeling & predictive analytics

  • Excellent verbal & written communication abilities

  • Experience building dashboards with Tableau.

jobs.title: UI/UX Artist - Puzzle Games
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

This position is Paris-based, with relocation support available.

Team

You will be an integral part of a newly established internal studio, a dynamic and focused team dedicated to one of our most promising prototype in scale. This studio is specifically chartered to improve this high-potential game up to the successful and market-ready title it is meant to become. 

In this exciting role, your initial focus will be on Card Factory!or This is Blast!, two games that have already demonstrated significant promise and captured our attention with their compelling core mechanics and engaging gameplay.

You'll have the opportunity to contribute directly to the growth and refinement of Card Factory! or This is Blast!, leveraging its existing traction to build a truly exceptional player experience. This is a unique chance to join a project with established momentum while still having a significant impact on the future direction within a dedicated and agile studio environment.

Role

  • Support the Art director in the ideation and execution of the game’s vision.

  • Design and implement a high-quality, scalable UI from concept to final integration in Unity.

  • Develop and optimize UX flows of new and existing features.

  • Create and maintain a comprehensive UI Style Bible and reusable component libraries.

  • Create high-quality  2D assets (menus, HUDs, buttons, icons, etc) and ensure optimal performance across mobile devices.

  • Setup, integrate, and animate UI scenes in Unity.

  • Work with Game Designers to ensure UI supports gameplay and accessibility goals.

  • Iterate quickly based on team feedback and live user data.

  • Propose creative ideas to boost player engagement and improve the user experience.

Profile

  • Experience as a UI/UX Artist on shipped mobile games.

  • Strong Unity skills, with the ability to implement and troubleshoot UI setups directly in engine.

  • Excellent 2D design skills, with a keen eye for visual hierarchy, composition, and readability.

  • Experience with A/B testing interfaces or working with LiveOps features.

  • A keen eye for emerging mobile game trends with the ability to creatively deconstruct and learn from success cases.

  • Ability to design, document and execute a consistent UI visual language.

  • Experience collaborating with cross-functional remote teams.

  • Fluent in English.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

jobs.title: Senior Game Artist (VFX) - Block Jam 3D
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

This position is fully remote CET ±2h or Barcelona-based.

Team

Our Gaming team is made up of hybrid-casual, casual, and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.

Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the largest and most successful hybrid publisher in the world.

You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on Block Jam 3D.

Role

In Blockjam 3D, our game artists are versatile generalists, each bringing a strong speciality to the team. We’re currently seeking a Game Artist with a particular strength in VFX to elevate the impact and polish of our game.

You’ll play a key role in enhancing the visual feedback and moment-to-moment feel of gameplay, while also contributing across broader art tasks as needed.

  • Enhance and refine existing visuals and effects within the game.

  • Collaborate with the team to deliver compelling new features and content.

  • Establish, maintain, and push the overall quality bar for VFX, ensuring consistency and excellence across the project.

Profile

  • You worked on several mobile casual games as a game artist and/or VFX artist.

  • Mastery of VFX pipeline for Unity / mobile.

  • Affinity with casual games art style.

  • Shader creation to support your VFX needs.

  • 3D generalist capabilities using Blender.

  • You get what “Snappy” and “Juicy” means.

  • Portfolio showcasing you’re the best fit for the role.

Benefits

  • Best-in-class compensation

  • Other benefits according to the country you reside

Team

At BeReal, we are dedicated to authenticity in social media. By encouraging users to share unfiltered moments, we foster genuine connections and celebrate real life. We are now an international team of 60+ and have 30M+ monthly active users. Backed by Voodoo, our team is fully focused on scaling BeReal into an iconic social network used by hundreds of millions.

We’ve built BeReal with a tiny technology team of world-class engineers and we intend to keep this mindset as we scale it to hundreds of millions of users. To achieve this, we ship new features faster than any other scaled social network while upgrading our infrastructure. We work in small teams of generalists and give each engineer high autonomy to make product related decisions.

  • Construct and manage robust data pipelines to align with ever-evolving business needs, ensuring optimal architecture support.

  • Contribute to the codebase, push and maintain your changes in production, and be an evangelist of good coding and data engineering practices

  • Take ownership of projects from initial discussions to release, including feature estimation & scoping, architecture design, benchmarking of new technologies, product feedback...

  • Work in a very agile environment with a fast decision process

  • GCP

jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Voodoo Ad-Network team is an autonomous product of around 30 people that carries the ambitious mission of providing ad network services. One goal is to leverage Voodoo’s first party data to improve Voodoo’s monetisation. Moreover the product is growing through new ventures like opening to external inventory, reaching external advertisers market and social network monetisation through BeReal recent acquisition. Thanks to promising results, our ambition is now to scale up the team to support growth.

The product is composed of top-tier software engineers, infrastructure engineers, data engineers, mobile engineers, and data scientists.

The Models team is a core element of the targeting performance. It leverages machine learning and a strong business understanding to directly impact the product financial performance. It’s composed of mostly seniors Data Analysts, Analytics Engineers, Data Engineers and Data Scientists/ML Engineers that iterate together on finding and building the next performing iteration.

Role

  • Collaborate closely with Data Scientists to improve various core components such as Feature store, Data Lakehouse, ML model serving.

  • Take ownership of projects from initial discussions to release, including feature estimation & scoping, architecture design, and benchmarking of new technologies

  • Build and maintain quality data pipelines to align with ever-evolving business needs

  • Contribute to the development our backend applications for ML model serving

  • Work closely with infrastructure teams to guarantee scalability

  • Work in a very agile environment with a fast decision process, having the opportunity to collaborate directly with people working on back-end development, data science, mobile games, broad audience mobile apps, product & marketing

Our Stack

  • Python ⧫ Amazon Web Services ⧫ Kubernetes ⧫ DBT ⧫ Airflow ⧫ Terraform

Profile

  • 5/6+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or another similar role

  • Experience with Spark at scale

  • Extensive experience with Python, ideally for both backend and ETL applications

  • Deep understanding of data lakehouse design and optimization

  • Experience with Amazon Web Services

  • Experience with Data Pipelines with DBT

  • Familiarity with scalability, reliability, and security topics

  • Understanding of the challenges involved in running ML models in production (familiar with topics such as feature store, training-serving skew, etc.)

  • Excellent communication skills, you can speak & write English

  • Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

  • Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family is 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Unlimited vacation policy

  • Remote days

jobs.descriptionHtml:
About BeReal

At BeReal, we are dedicated to authenticity in social media. By encouraging users to share unfiltered moments, we foster genuine connections and celebrate real life. We are now an international team of 70+ and have 40M+ monthly active users. Backed by Voodoo, our team is fully focused on scaling BeReal into an iconic social network used by hundreds of millions.

Role

BeReal’s product team is a small group of high-performers reporting directly to the CEO. We operate at the intersection of data science, engineering, design, and operations. Highly autonomous and skilled across multiple areas, each member of the team is expected to identify opportunities, design high-impact solutions, drive implementation, and assess results.

  • Partner with a small team of engineers & designers to come up with, build, test, and scale new high-impact features.

  • Combine analytics and user research to identify user drives, fuel ideation, and lead product improvements.

  • Contribute to high-level strategic decisions. Help define short and long-term roadmaps.

  • Identify key metrics and take ownership for improving them.

  • You’re passionate about B2C mobile apps and have a proven track record of building meaningful products.

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist - Ad network
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile gaming industry.

Within the Data team, you’ll join the Ad-Network Team which is an autonomous squad of around 30 people.  The team is composed of top-tier software engineers, infrastructure engineers, data engineers, mobile engineers, and data scientists (among which 3 Kaggle Masters).

The goal of this team is to provide a way for Voodoo to monetize our inventory directly with advertising partners, and relies on advanced technological solutions to optimize advertising in a real-time bidding environment. It is a strategic project with significant impact on the business on direct margin, advertisement content selection, game prototype testing and audience survey. Our product is already showing promising signs of success and is now entering a fast-paced scaling phase.

We want to onboard a passionate senior data scientist with significant experience in a similar environment to allow us to go one step further. This is an opportunity to have a strategic and critical impact on Voodoo’s success.

This position is hybrid and requires 2/3 days per week in the office based in Paris. 

Role

  • Improve existing models or propose new approaches to our current install rate and LTV estimation models

  • Build and deploy quickly scalable ML systems 

  • Work closely with product managers and other engineers to ensure that incremental ML performance translates into significant business impact

  • Discuss state of the art ML topics with other data scientists, share ideas and challenge existing systems

  • Gain understanding of and engage in developing a variety of essential components to build an advertising network, including: A/B testing systems, budget management, creative selection, performance monitoring, campaign optimization, app profiling, and user profiling

  • Closely examine the performance of the ad network to identify issues and propose data-driven ideas.

Profile

  • 6/8 years+ of experience building machine learning systems

  • Prior experience working in dynamic, production-focused environments

  • You’re excited by the latest deep learning advancements but also familiar with the ins and outs of gradient boosting

  • You like to deep dive into complex topics to squeeze the last bit of performance

  • Strong achievements on Kaggle will be valued

  • You enjoy working in a team, learning new things, sharing knowledge

  • Excellent Communication in English mandatory, French is a nice to have

Benefits

  • Competitive salary 

  • Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)
