jobs.title: Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer (DevOps) - BeReal
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

At BeReal, we are dedicated to authenticity in social media. By encouraging users to share unfiltered moments, we foster genuine connections and celebrate real life. We are now an international team of 30+ and have 40M+ monthly active users. Backed by Voodoo, our team is fully focused on scaling BeReal into an iconic social network used by hundreds of millions.

The Infrastructure team provides the backbone that powers the company’s growth, ensuring the scalability, efficiency, and reliability of our platform. We design and operate our infrastructure on GCP. Working hand in hand with developers, we enable teams to ship fast and efficiently while maintaining a strong focus on costs and performance. Our mission is to create a developer-friendly, cost-effective, and highly automated infrastructure that supports innovation at scale.

Role

  • Design, implement, and optimize infrastructure for availability, scalability, and cost efficiency

  • Build and maintain self-serve tooling for developers (local environments, service creation, architecture design, infrastructure deployment)

  • Take ownership of automation for infrastructure and deployment tasks (e.g., Terraform, Terragrunt, Kubernetes)

  • Lead FinOps initiatives, developing tools and insights to optimize cloud costs

  • Improve developer experience, enabling rapid iteration with better local dev setups, fast build/deploy cycles, and efficient squad environments

  • Analyze performance bottlenecks and work on solutions such as scaling strategies, service optimizations, and system debugging

  • Work hand-in-hand with development squads, providing support, guidance, and infrastructure improvements tailored to their needs

Our stack

  • Operator: Kubernetes

  • CI/CD: Argocd, Github actions

  • Cloud provider: GCP

  • Monitoring: Datadog

  • Infra as code: Terraform / Terragrunt

  • Languages: golang / node

  • Datastores: Spanner / PostgreSQL / Redis

Profile

  • Strong knowledge of Kubernetes

  • Experience with high traffic, distributed systems architectures, and related tools (service discovery, config/secret management, etc.)

  • Strong knowledge of one Cloud provider (AWS or GCP preferred)

  • Ownership-driven – If something isn’t working, you don’t wait for instructions; you improve it

  • Self-serve & platform engineering approach – You create tools that empower developers, not dependencies

  • Balance between pragmatism and long-term vision – You iterate fast while keeping scalability in mind

  • Performance vs cost-conscious – You make decisions that align with both technical excellence and financial sustainability

Benefits:

Competitive salary upon experience

Swile Lunch voucher

Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family is 100% borne by Voodoo

Child day care facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

Wellness activities in our Paris office

Remote days and other benefits according to the country you reside in.

Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.

Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the world's largest and most successful hybrid publisher.

You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on Paper.io 2.

With Paper.io 2, we’re building an iconic game that players will never forget!

We're a small team of excellent people who take care of everything from ideas to testing, and we intend to grow while maintaining our high standards.

Role

As a Concept Artist focusing on Concept Art, you will play a vital role in shaping the visual identity of Paper.io 2. Collaborating closely with the Art Director, you will create, develop, and integrate stunning game assets, elevating the production quality of our live games as we transition them into the casual space.

  • Art Creation:

    • Design and produce high-quality concept art for characters, environments, and props.

    • Work on illustrations for icons or stylised assets that align with the game’s aesthetic.

  • Collaboration:

    • Partner with the Art Director to align on visual style and direction.

    • Actively contribute by providing creative ideas and constructive feedback.

  • Conceptualisation:

    • Gather references, brainstorm ideas, and create mock-ups that clearly communicate the artistic vision.

    • Contribute to the creative direction by delivering compelling and innovative designs.

Profile

  • Experience:

    • 4+ years as a Concept Artist, in the mobile gaming industry.

    • Strong capabilities in concept art, including a keen eye for detail, composition, and style.

    • Ability to adapt to different visual styles and produce assets that align with the game’s vision.

    • Strong Illustration skills

  • Technical Proficiency:

    • Skilled in tools like Maya, Blender, Unity, and Photoshop.

    • Proficient in low-poly modelling and texturing pipelines; familiarity with Maya rigging workflows is a plus.

    • Experience working with Unity

  • Soft Skills:

    • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey ideas clearly and collaborate effectively with a multidisciplinary team.

    • Resourceful and proactive, with the ability to troubleshoot and iterate effectively.

    • Strong problem-solving abilities

Nice to have

  • Create low-poly 3D models, including texturing, to meet both technical and artistic requirements.

  • Experience in VFX creation or animation.

Benefits

  • Best-in-class compensation

  • Other benefits according to the country you reside

jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

At WeMoms, we understand the complexities of motherhood. More than an app, we're a guiding compass for mothers globally, making motherhood feel intuitive and supported. Our vision is to create an ever-present circle of trust, wisdom, and support for every mom.We deliver personalized, empowering guidance and resources to mothers at every stage of their journey.

Our partnership with Voodoo, a global leader in mobile gaming and apps, propels us on a hyper growth path. We are a passionate team of 30 professionals. As we embark on this exciting growth phase, we're looking for talented individuals to join us in shaping the future of motherhood support.

If you're driven to make a real difference in mothers' lives and thrive in a rapidly growing tech environment, we invite you to be part of our journey. Help us entertain and support the world, one mother at a time.

Role

As part of the Account Manager team, you'll be taking care of our various partners to help them achieve their objectives and create a relationship that is as close as it is effective.
We're looking for an intern to join our team, starting January 2026.

Key Responsibilities

  • Participate to the partner's onboarding and follow-up of the relationship

  • Draft and send on-boarding piges to ensure compliance of operations

  • Be a key stakeholder in the campaign launches

  • Monitor partner campaigns (outputs, performances reports...)

  • Support the Sales teams during campaign reviews

  • Carry out campaign reviews

  • Maintaining day-to-day commercial relations to grow the relationship with our partners

Profile

  • Looking for an internship starting in January 2026 (internship agreement with the school)

  • Interested to work directly with partners and create strong and long-term partnerships

  • Experience in an agency or ad network is a plus

Perks

  • Paid internship

  • Offices in the heart of Paris (2nd arrondissement)

  • Meal vouchers

This position is fully remote or Barcelona-based.

Team

Our Gaming team is made up of hybrid-casual, casual, and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.

Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the world's largest and most successful hybrid publisher.

Voodoo is creating a small experimentation team with a big mission: find the next best way to entertain the world by taking our best hits to a new level.

You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on Hole.io.

Role

We are looking for a Technical Artist to join our internal game studio at Voodoo, working on Hole.io. As part of a small, agile team, you will bridge the gap between art and engineering, helping to optimize workflows, enhance visual quality, and ensure smooth performance across mobile platforms. Your work will directly impact the player experience in our high-performing genre-defining casual game.

  • Optimize game assets, shaders, and rendering pipelines for smooth performance on mobile devices.

  • Develop tools and scripts in Unity to streamline the workflow for artists and developers.

  • Work closely with game designers, artists, and developers to bring creative visions to life while maintaining technical efficiency.

  • Implement VFX, shaders, and lighting techniques to enhance the game’s visual appeal.

  • Ensure asset optimization (compression, polygon count, texture sizes) & optimal import into Unity without sacrificing quality.

  • Debug and troubleshoot graphical and performance issues on different mobile devices.

  • Stay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in mobile game art and Unity development.

Profile

  • Experience: 5+ years as a Technical Artist in the mobile gaming industry

  • Strong Unity expertise, including shader development (Shader Graph/HLSL), particle systems, and rendering optimization

  • Proficiency in C# scripting for automating processes and enhancing tools

  • Understanding of mobile game constraints (performance, memory, draw calls, batching)

  • Experience with lighting, VFX, post-processing, and GPU profiling

  • Knowledge of 3D modeling and texturing workflows (Blender, Maya, Photoshop, Substance)

  • Ability to debug and optimize art assets and rendering issues.

Benefits

Benefits: competitive salary and other benefits according to the country you reside.

jobs.title: Senior - Staff Backend Engineer - Inference Platform
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile industry. 

Within the Data team, you’ll join the Ad-Network Team which is an autonomous squad of around 30 people.  The team is composed of top-tier software engineers, infrastructure engineers, data engineers, mobile engineers, and data scientists (among which 3 Kaggle Masters). The goal of this team is to provide a way for Voodoo to monetize our inventory directly with advertising partners, and relies on advanced technological solutions to optimize advertising in a real-time bidding environment. It is a strategic topic with significant impact on the business.

The role can be full remote but France-based.

Role

  • Lead the design and architecture of backend services that power real-time model inference and bidding decisions for our OpenRTB platform.

  • Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning engineers to deploy, monitor, and optimize ML models that influence real-time bidding strategies, pricing decisions, and targeting.

  • Oversee the development of A/B testing frameworks and ensure the seamless integration of experimentation tools into our platform for continuous model and bidding optimization.

  • Ensure that all backend services are high-performance, low-latency, and scalable, capable of handling large data volumes (millions of bidding events per second).

  • Set best practices for architecture, API design, and distributed systems to ensure robust and maintainable systems at scale.

  • Work with the cloud infrastructure teams to ensure efficient deployment, scaling, and monitoring of backend services using Kubernetes, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines.

  • Work closely with product managers to define and implement new features, optimizations, and improvements to the bidding and model inference system.

  • Lead efforts to optimize performance and cost-efficiency across the backend infrastructure, ensuring that the system can scale effectively with increasing traffic and data.

  • Continuously monitor the system’s performance, perform post-deployment analysis, and make improvements based on real-world usage and A/B test results.

Profile

  • 8+ years of experience in backend engineering, with a strong focus on designing and building scalable, high-performance systems.

  • Extensive experience in distributed systems, microservices, and API design using technologies such as Java, Scala, Python, or Go.

  • Expertise in real-time data processing and event-driven architectures (e.g., Kafka, GCP Pub/Sub, Kinesis) for building responsive, low-latency systems.

  • Hands-on experience with observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, Datadog) for metrics collection, log aggregation, and system monitoring.

  • Deep understanding of A/B testing frameworks and experience integrating them into backend systems for experimentation and optimization.

  • Proven ability to design, build, and manage complex cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure), including managing services with Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud-native tools.

  • Solid experience with CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure automation tools (e.g., Terraform).

  • A focus on building reliable, maintainable, and scalable systems, with experience in performance tuning and cost optimization.

  • Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex technical challenges and provide innovative solutions.

Nice to have

  • Experience with OpenRTB and real-time bidding systems.

  • Familiarity with machine ****learning and deploying models for inference in production.strategies.

  • Exposure to data science workflows and understanding how data engineers and data scientists collaborate in productionizing ML models.

  • Contributions to open-source projects or active involvement in technical communities related to backend engineering or machine learning.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary upon experience

  • Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family is 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Child day care facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Unlimited vacation policy

  • Remote days

ABOUT VOODOO

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.


TEAM

The Engineering & Data team builds innovative tech products and platforms to support the impressive growth of their gaming and consumer apps which allow Voodoo to stay at the forefront of the mobile industry. 

Within the Data team, you’ll join the Ad-Network Team which is an autonomous squad of around 30 people.  The team is composed of top-tier software engineers, infrastructure engineers, data engineers, mobile engineers, and data scientists (among which 3 Kaggle Masters). The goal of this team is to provide a way for Voodoo to monetize our inventory directly with advertising partners, and relies on advanced technological solutions to optimize advertising in a real-time bidding environment. It is a strategic topic with significant impact on the business.



The role can be full remote but France-based.


ROLE

 - Lead the design and architecture of backend services that power real-time model inference and bidding decisions for our OpenRTB platform.

 - Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning engineers to deploy, monitor, and optimize ML models that influence real-time bidding strategies, pricing decisions, and targeting.

 - Oversee the development of A/B testing frameworks and ensure the seamless integration of experimentation tools into our platform for continuous model and bidding optimization.

 - Ensure that all backend services are high-performance, low-latency, and scalable, capable of handling large data volumes (millions of bidding events per second).

 - Set best practices for architecture, API design, and distributed systems to ensure robust and maintainable systems at scale.

 - Work with the cloud infrastructure teams to ensure efficient deployment, scaling, and monitoring of backend services using Kubernetes, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines.

 - Work closely with product managers to define and implement new features, optimizations, and improvements to the bidding and model inference system.

 - Lead efforts to optimize performance and cost-efficiency across the backend infrastructure, ensuring that the system can scale effectively with increasing traffic and data.

 - Continuously monitor the system’s performance, perform post-deployment analysis, and make improvements based on real-world usage and A/B test results.


PROFILE

 - 8+ years of experience in backend engineering, with a strong focus on designing and building scalable, high-performance systems.

 - Extensive experience in distributed systems, microservices, and API design using technologies such as Java, Scala, Python, or Go.

 - Expertise in real-time data processing and event-driven architectures (e.g., Kafka, GCP Pub/Sub, Kinesis) for building responsive, low-latency systems.

 - Hands-on experience with observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, Datadog) for metrics collection, log aggregation, and system monitoring.

 - Deep understanding of A/B testing frameworks and experience integrating them into backend systems for experimentation and optimization.

 - Proven ability to design, build, and manage complex cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure), including managing services with Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud-native tools.

 - Solid experience with CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure automation tools (e.g., Terraform).

 - A focus on building reliable, maintainable, and scalable systems, with experience in performance tuning and cost optimization.

 - Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex technical challenges and provide innovative solutions.


NICE TO HAVE

 - Experience with OpenRTB and real-time bidding systems.

 - Familiarity with machine ****learning and deploying models for inference in production.strategies http://production.strategies.

 - Exposure to data science workflows and understanding how data engineers and data scientists collaborate in productionizing ML models.

 - Contributions to open-source projects or active involvement in technical communities related to backend engineering or machine learning.


BENEFITS

 - Competitive salary upon experience

 - Comprehensive relocation package (including visa support)

 - Swile Lunch voucher

 - Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

 - Premium healthcare coverage SideCare, for your family is 100% borne by Voodoo

 - Child day care facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

 - Wellness activities in our Paris office

 - Unlimited vacation policy

 - Remote days

jobs.title: 캠퍼스 리드 - BeReal
jobs.descriptionHtml:
진정성 있는 소셜 미디어 앱 BeReal이 대한민국의 주요 대학들과 협력하여 학생 주도의 프로그램, 특별 이벤트, 그리고 앰버서더 이니셔티브를 시작합니다.

BeReal 팀의 지원 아래, 구조적이고 인센티브가 제공되는 프로그램을 통해 BeReal을 여러분의 캠퍼스로 가져오세요.

직무 개요

각 대학에는 1~2명의 BeReal 캠퍼스 리드가 있습니다.

이들은 캠퍼스 내 프로그램을 총괄하며, 학생 단체로부터 앰버서더를 모집하고, BeReal 브랜드 이벤트 및 활동을 기획하고 실행합니다.

주요 업무 및 보상

  • 다양한 학생 단체로부터 앰버서더 팀을 모집 및 관리

  • BeReal 브랜드가 반영된 캠퍼스 이벤트 기획 및 주도

  • BeReal과 대학 커뮤니티 간의 주요 연락 창구 역할

  • 활동 성과를 모니터링하고 월별 보고

월 고정급: ₩150,000

성과 인센티브: 신규 유저 1명(친구 5명 이상 추가 기준)당 ₩1,000

BeReal 공식 굿즈 제공 (캠퍼스 내 브랜드 홍보용)

앰버서더 프로그램 및 인센티브

앰버서더는 캠퍼스 리드가 모집하는 학생들로,

입소문, 캠퍼스 이벤트, 소셜 미디어 콘텐츠를 통해 BeReal을 홍보하는 역할을 담당합니다.

캠퍼스 리드는 아래와 같은 다양한 학생 커뮤니티로부터 앰버서더를 모집해야 합니다:

스포츠, 공연예술, 학술 동아리

패션 & 뷰티, 음악 & 문화 동아리

기술 & 게임 관련 단체

국제학생 협회, 학생회 등

BeReal 캠퍼스 이벤트)-

BeReal은 학생들의 진짜 일상을 반영하는 캠퍼스 이벤트를 지원합니다.

예시:

새내기 환영주간(Welcome Week) 활동

동아리 파티 및 사교 모임

BeReal 테마 사진 콘테스트

공동 브랜드 기념품 증정 및 프로모션

jobs.title: Senior Player Experience and Game Feel Developer - Mob Control
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

This position is fully remote CET ±2h or Barcelona-based.

Team

Our Gaming team is made up of casual, and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.

Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient games generating more than $20m per year, we are the world's largest and most successful hybrid publisher.

You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on Mob Control.

With Mob Control, we’re building an iconic game that players will never forget!

We're a small team who take care of everything from ideas to testing, and we intend to grow while maintaining our high standards.

Role

We are looking for a Senior Game Developer - Player Experience and Game Feel, passionate about delivering unforgettable player experiences.
You will craft highly polished, satisfying, and responsive features that elevate how players feel the game, from moment-to-moment gameplay to UI/UX and overall flow.

You will work closely with Designers, Artists, and other Developers to bring ideas to life with precision and care. You will own features end-to-end, ensuring every interaction feels great to play.

What you'll do:

  • Build and iterate on player-facing features across gameplay, metagame, and UI

  • Write robust, maintainable and extensible code, used by millions of players worldwide

  • Polish and refine systems with a strong focus on feel, clarity, and delight

  • Work hand-in-hand with design and art teams to bring ideas from concept to final implementation

  • Maintain smooth performance and high-quality experiences across a wide range of devices

  • Contribute to the overall quality bar of the game, ensuring every player touchpoint feels great.

With this role, you will have a strong impact on the company, contributing daily to key decisions alongside a senior, multidisciplinary team of passionate and talented people.
You will refine every detail of gameplay and feedback loops, ensuring every moment feels great to play.

If you live for the small details, the perfect animation timing, the satisfying click of a button, the spark of joy when everything just flows, this is your place.
Thanks to your creativity, care, and teamwork, together we’ll entertain millions of players with truly unforgettable experiences.

Profile

  • 5+ years of experience in Unity (or equivalent engine)

  • Strong sense of gameplay feel and great attention to detail

  • Excellent programming skills, clean coding practices, and a strong ability to contribute to scalable architectures

  • Proven track record of shipping high-quality mobile games with strong player experience focus

  • Experience with shaders and VFX

  • Fluent in English, with great collaboration and communication skills

Nice-to-have

  • Familiarity with mobile performance optimization

  • Background in responsive controls and satisfying interactions

Benefits

  • Best-in-class compensation

  • Other benefits according to the country you reside

jobs.title: Agency Lead Japan - BeReal
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About BeReal

At BeReal, we are dedicated to authenticity in social media. By encouraging users to share unfiltered moments, we foster genuine connections and celebrate real life. We are now an international team of 70+ and have 40M+ monthly active users. Backed by Voodoo, our team is fully focused on scaling BeReal into an iconic social network used by hundreds of millions.

Role

As Voodoo is integrating BeReal, the company is looking to grow its sales team around the world to drive ad sales to agencies and brands. As BeReal’s Agency Lead, you will be responsible for designing and executing the local Japanese sales strategy by selling traditional and innovative ad inventory to key agencies.

You will leverage Voodoo’s unique know-how in app monetization to establish new business for BeReal.

You will need extensive brand and agency contacts in Japan at major Holdcos (Dentsu, Hakuhodo, CyberAgent, etc) and independent agencies to succeed. These contacts should be decision makers for trading, social media and investment teams.

You need to have a deep knowledge of the digital advertising landscape.

You will be also responsible for the long-term development of business relationships with these prospects.

  • Own your local agency strategy and roadmap.

  • Build awareness and adoption around BeReal offering with agencies through client presentations, conference attendance and networking events.

  • Combine new business development and sales skills with long-term relationship management.

  • Engage with senior agency executives to drive deal growth in the long-term.

  • Communicate effectively internally to coordinate resources (Ads Ops, Publishing Management, User acquisition, etc...) and effectively sell our inventory

Profile

  • You have 5 years+ of experience in digital ad sales in Japan with an outstanding track record in selling ad products to Agencies.

  • Social media mobile experience is a strong plus.

  • You have a strong track record. 

  • A high degree of creativity, self-motivation, and drive.

  • An expert in managing a portfolio of clients and understanding the mobile ecosystem in a way that you can respond thoroughly and persuasively to the client’s needs and questions.

jobs.title: Senior QA Engineer - Hole.io
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

Team

Our Gaming team is made up of hybrid-casual, casual, and mid-core experts. Our 'Core' games team supports internal and external studios worldwide in creating, developing, and launching new hit games, whilst our 'Live' games team focuses on delivering higher engagement on our existing and successful games.

Joining our Live games team means collaborating with gaming industry experts on globally renowned, enduring games while embracing exciting new entrepreneurial ventures. With over seven billion downloads worldwide and a portfolio of more than 10 resilient hybrid games generating more than $20m per year, we are the largest and most successful hybrid publisher in the world.

You will be joining one of our Live Studios, working on Hole.io.

Role

As a Senior Quality Assurance Engineer at Voodoo, you will lead our approach to maintaining our game health and free of defects.

Together with the rest of the team, you will be in charge of testing the game and minimizing the number of defects in it:

  • Conduct comprehensive testing of our mobile games to identify and document crucial defects, taking ownership of the entire QA process to assure quality and user experience.

  • Assist in creating processes and tools to improve the overall quality of the game.

  • Follow the technical KPIs of our live games and propose strategies to continuously improve them.

  • Coordinate closely with design and development teams, understanding game mechanics and providing essential feedback to improve and refine the product.

  • Design test plans for new features and releases.

  • Prioritize and execute testing tasks efficiently at different development stages, aligning with project timelines and objectives while independently addressing and resolving issues found.

  • Foster an open feedback culture, actively participating in constructive dialogue with team members to facilitate collaboration and innovation.

  • Work with our central tech teams in quality-related initiatives.

Profile

  • 3+ years as a QA Engineer in Mobile Games, demonstrating ownership and successful project completion.

  • Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to take up tasks from start to finish with little assistance and identify and address issues independently and effectively.

  • Reliable self-starter and team player, capable of taking responsibility and contributing positively to team dynamics.

  • Passion for mobile games with insight into the player's perspective and expectations.

  • Proven experience using various testing tools and methodologies for mobile games.

  • Clear communication skills with the ability to articulate complex ideas to various stakeholders effectively.

  • Good understanding of Free-to-Play (F2P) games and game design principles and release management experience are a plus

  • Fluent English (speaking and writing)

Benefits

  • Best-in-class compensation

  • Other benefits according to the country you reside

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Team

Blitz is a gaming platform launched by Voodoo in 2021, allowing players to compete on mobile games for real cash prizes (head-up, tournaments, leagues, etc.). It is leveraging Voodoo’s unique game portfolio to engage users in a fun and rewarding way.


Role

We are looking for a talented iOS Engineer who will play a key role in the development of Blitz, our real-money gaming platform.

  • Develop, maintain, and optimize Blitz’s iOS application to deliver a high-performance, engaging experience for users.

  • Collaborate with designers, product managers, and backend engineers to implement features and functionality.

  • Work on integrating visually appealing and interactive motion design elements to enhance the user experience.

  • Ensure the app adheres to best practices for code quality, performance, and maintainability.

  • Debug and resolve issues, ensuring the app runs smoothly across various iOS devices and versions.

jobs.title: Senior Data Analyst - Puzzle Games
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Voodoo

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.

This position is Paris-based, with relocation support available.

Team

You will be an integral part of a newly established internal studio, a dynamic and focused team dedicated to one of our most promising prototype in scale. This studio is specifically chartered to improve this high-potential game up to the successful and market-ready title it is meant to become.

In this exciting role, your focus will be on This is Blast!, two games that have already demonstrated significant promise and captured our attention with their compelling core mechanics and engaging gameplay.

Role

  • Act as a trusted advisor on all things data, establishing best practices for data collection, analysis, and reporting.

  • Lead the analysis of large, complex datasets to understand player behavior and identify opportunities for growth in engagement, retention, and monetization.

  • Translate data insights into clear recommendations to inform game design, feature development, and the overall product roadmap.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with game designers, product managers, and developers to ensure data-driven strategies are embedded throughout the game’s lifecycle.

  • Design, build, and maintain automated dashboards and reports, ensuring the entire team has access to critical metrics and insights.

  • Utilize A/B testing to evaluate and optimize game features and mechanics, driving measurable improvements in key performance indicators.

Profile

  • At least 3 years of analytical work experience in the gaming, tech or a data-driven industry, with a proven track record working in close connection with product teams.

  • Proficient with SQL and either R or Python, with a proven experience working with large and complex data sets.

  • Good knowledge of statistical analysis and concepts used for industry-standard methods like AB testing or forecasting.

  • Autonomous person with a strong analytical mind, problem-solving skills and strong attention to detail.

  • Ability to understand a business problem, turn it into an analytics/statistics problem and solve it using adequate methods.

  • Highly pragmatic mindset with the ability to quickly identify what needs to be focused on and what can be considered of lower priority.

  • Capacity to be the pro-active owner of the entire data chain for your game.

Benefits

  • Competitive salary

  • Premium healthcare (SideCare) for you and your family 100% borne by Voodoo

  • Swile Lunch voucher

  • Gymlib (100% borne by Voodoo)

  • Wellness activities in our Paris office

  • Child daycare facilities (Les Petits Chaperons rouges)

Team

Role

As Technical Cloud Infrastructure Manager, you'll be responsible for both the strategic evolution and the operational excellence of Voodoo’s central infrastructure on AWS. You will lead a highly skilled team of 4 engineers in a platform-oriented model, providing reliable, scalable cloud services. You’ll work closely with the VP of the Business Unit and cross-functional teams to build, operate, and continuously improve a resilient cloud environment while supporting internal teams in designing, evolving, and optimizing their infrastructure stacks.

Your main responsibilities will be to:

  • Lead and mentor your team, fostering a culture of ownership, collaboration, and excellence.

  • Operate and evolve Voodoo’s core infrastructure stacks (AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform), ensuring security, scalability, and best practices.

  • Drive the evolution of Voodoo’s core technical stacks: AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform.

  • Oversee the observability stack (Prometheus, Grafana) to ensure proper monitoring and metrics.

  • Define, maintain, and track the infrastructure roadmap in collaboration with business and technical stakeholders.

  • Support development teams in designing, evolving, and optimizing their infrastructure, promoting best practices for architecture and cloud security.

  • Monitor and optimize cloud costs, implementing FinOps practices and ensuring cost-efficient use of resources.

  • Proactively identify opportunities and anticipate challenges in platform and infrastructure operations.

AWS; Terraform; Kubernetes ; Prometheus; Grafana

ABOUT VOODOO

Founded in 2013, Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps with a mission to entertain the world. Gathering 800 employees, 7 billion downloads, and over 200 million active users, Voodoo is the #3 mobile publisher worldwide in terms of downloads after Google and Meta. Our portfolio includes chart-topping games like Mob Control and Block Jam, alongside popular apps such as BeReal and Wizz.


TEAM

Our Growth team is a transversal entity aiming to maximize and deliver the potential of any mobile product. It combines user acquisition, creative content production, monetization, and the tech capabilities required to turn applications into global hits. With over 150 experts, we operate at the forefront of mobile marketing and ad tech across various types of games (hypercasual, hybrid, 100% IAP).


ROLE

We’re looking for a 2D Animator to join our Growth team. In this role, you will:

 - Create short, catchy 2D animations inspired by stickmen / simple character storytelling

 - Bring Cuby (Paper.io http://Paper.io 2’s main character) to life through fun, unexpected, and relatable situations

 - Collaborate with our creative and growth teams to brainstorm ideas and adapt content for social platforms and advertising use

 - Produce weekly animated clips (simple yet viral-oriented) aligned with the Paper.io http://Paper.io 2 tone of voice and brand identity.


PROFILE

 - Strong experience in 2D animation / motion design (After Effects, Toon Boom, or similar tools).

 - Ability to create simple, expressive, and dynamic animations with a focus on storytelling and humor.

 - A good eye for timing, rhythm, and virality in short-form content.

 - Autonomous, creative, and comfortable iterating quickly.

 - Bonus: experience or interest in gaming content, especially mobile games.

 - Bonus: solid understanding of Gen Z trends and social media culture (what’s viral, what’s cringe, and what works).


BENEFITS

 - Creative freedom to experiment with your own animation style.

 - A chance to shape the visual world of one of Voodoo’s biggest games.

 - Flexible collaboration (remote, async).

 - Competitive freelance rate depending on experience.
